column2: NHL_Stats_2020_2021$Pos = factor(NHL_Stats_2020_2021$Pos, levels = c("C", "R", "L", "D"), labels = c("Centerman", "Right Wing", "Left Wing", "Defenseman"))
ggplot(subset(NHL_Stats_2020_2021, GP >= 28), aes(GP, P, color = Pos)) +
ggtitle("Can Position Indicate Amount of Points Scored Per Season?") +
